department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Development, support and engineering activities for Informatics professional services.
description: Develop, support and engineer activities for Informatics professional services. Award up to five (5) contracts.
full_summary:
**Enterprise Engineering and Deployment Services (EEDS) RFP** ================
================ **Reference Number:** WS4223001772-Doc4234133321
**Amendment Number:** 11
**Publication Date:** 2023-09-28 **Closing Date:** November 24, 2023, at 14:00:00 EST
**Solicitation Number:** WS4223001772
**Status:** Expired
**UNSPSC Code:** 80101507 – Information technology consultation services

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proponents to submit proposals for the Enterprise Engineering and Deployment Services (EEDS) contract, under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) for the following Workstreams: * Workstream 1 (up to 2 contracts) * Workstream 2 (up to 3 contracts)

**Overview** Directorate Information Management Engineering and Integration (DIMEI) and the Defence 365 (D365) program require informatics professional services, including support and engineering activities, for a period of 3 years, with the option to extend for 2 additional years. This RFP will secure up to five contracts with the successful proponents, with each contract covering work from either Workstream 1 or Workstream 2, but not both.

**Submission Requirements** All supporting documentation and bids must be submitted by **November 24, 2023, at 14:00:00 EST**. Any bids received after this time will be rejected as non-responsive.

**Contact Information** * MacIntosh, Anna (SPAC/PSPC) * Email: [anna.macintosh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:anna.macintosh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
**Attachments** * The notice is available at: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17579830?extsite=MTc1Nzk4MzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17579830?extsite=MTc1Nzk4MzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) ---
